thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: North Korea Repositions Hacking Unit for Global Cyberattacks

author: Timothy W. Martin
title: North Korea Repositions Hacking Unit for Global Cyberattacks
text:
One of North Korea’s three major hacking units, in a strategic shift, is hunting for overseas targets and not covering its tracks, according to a new report, a sign the regime is expanding its cyber attacks under tightened sanctions.

The group, referred to as “Reaper” by cybersecurity firm FireEye Inc., had long focused on harassing South Korea’s public institutions, military and private companies. But last year, the unit attacked Japan, Vietnam and the Middle East, wielding surprisingly sophisticated skills in seeking covert...
